basic_info.description: Jae is a software developer and project manager who loves learning, solving problems, and organizing teams. Jae enjoys working with Javascript in both front-end and back-end applications and hopes to use their skills to bring websites to life with people who are working to change the world for the better. For fun Jae loves writing, baking, and travel.

projects.title: Meditation WebApp
projects.description: The most expanded application I have had the opportunity to work with. Application greets user by name and allows the user to make some choices to curate a meditation for themselves.

projects.title: Sales Page
projects.description: Site that allows the user to easily view their sales for a product and allows the user to add more information to be recorded by the site.

projects.title: Calendar Carousel
projects.description: Site that uses REST Applications, Google Auth and Google Calendar API, and custom designed time tracker for task organization.
